After punching and kicking the opponent a few times, Tobi performs the [[Skewering Headbutt (Me)|Skewering Headbutt]], burrowing himself underground, and comes up from below his opponent, performing a kanchō on them.

== Trivia ==
* A [[Wikipedia:Kanchō|kanchō]] is a Japanese prank common among children. It's also present in [[One Thousand Years of Death]].
